definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: This approach created for the treatment of induration after intramuscular injection is also very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用于创建硬化治疗后，这种做法肌肉注射也很有效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Anaesthesia by muscle injection is the safest anesthesia approach.
sentences.chinese: 结论头孢西丁钠临床静脉和肌肉注射给药安全。

sentences.english: The rabbits were anesthetized by ketamine.
sentences.chinese: 采用肌肉注射复方氯胺酮进行麻醉。

sentences.english: Results This is a disorder of contracture of gluteal muscles.
sentences.chinese: 结果臀肌挛缩症与肌肉注射关系十分密切。

sentences.english: The injection is to be administered intramuscularly, into the upper, outside quadrant of the gluteus.
sentences.chinese: 注入要臀大肌肌肉注射，到上层的，外面象限使用。

sentences.english: The focus of this thesis is the design of a portable needle-free intramuscular injection device.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点旨在设计可携式无针肌肉注射装置。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to drip into/to transfuse/to percolate/to drip feed/fig. to instill
